extendedInfo.description: The brand-new Nature-style theme plug-in for 9s-Weather, 9s-Weather Theme+(Nature), is here to specialize your daily weather.9s-Weather Theme+(Nature) displays weather conditions via amazingly magnificent and charming Nature scenes, which gives you a unprecedented visual experience.Now 9s-Weather brings you more fancy designed graphics to entertain your home screen, your weather, and your daily use of Android phone.1. The plug-in might require an installed main app 9s-Weather2. You are able to restore this plug-in apk in your SD cardMenu > setting > application > manage application > 9s-Weather Theme+> move to SD cardMain app: 9s-Weather Quick Overview:1. Home screen widget (2x1, 4x1, 4x2, 4x4)2. Digital world clock3. Animated movement4. Current weather condition & 3-day indicates5. Google Satellite Map6. Accuweather database support7. C/F adaptable

reviews.comment: Some of the scenes are lovely, but it could all be so if you slowed down the disconcertingly fast cloud speed, pleeease?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: JUNK
reviews.comment: I\'d like my money back. I doenloaded the original 9\'s and can\'t choose any options what so ever :-(
reviews.author: A Google User
